name: curatedDataSource
description: The database or curator of the curated data.

name: curatedDataType
description: The type of information being curated.

enumValues.description: Syntactic sequences that has a role as reference of an annotation.
A unique gene name approved by an organism specific nomenclature committee.
Data obtained through patient examination or treatment.
A term that expresses the function of a gene product.
A chemical descriptor is a data item (quantity or value) about a chemical entity that conforms to a specification for how it is calculated, measured or recorded.
